# trailingText

**Instance Property**

The list item’s supplementary text.

## Declaration

```swift
var trailingText: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The list item displays any supplementaty text in its trailing region.

## Managing Content

- **text**: The list item’s primary text.
- **detailText**: The list item’s secondary text.
title: trailingText
